venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Come and meet other Boston area Sci-Fi and Fantasy fans in a comfortable setting!

This is our regular social meetup, which always happens on the First Tuesday of every month.

This month, we're going to try out the Tavern in the Square in Central Square (NOTE: NOT THE ONE IN PORTER SQUARE). This worked out very well for us in September, we effectively had a private room to ourselves! Just ask at the entrance for the SciFi meetup.

If you're taking the T, Central Square is on the Red Line.

We'll probably talk about the books, television, movies, comics and games that we like (and those we don't like, and even those we may be ashamed to admit that we like), but there is no set agenda!

If you're can't come on time, that's fine, there is usually still a critical mass of people until 10:30 PM (or later).
item.how_to_find_us: Either ask at the hostess stand or look for the geeks with the Red and White Meetup signs
item.name: October Social Meetup
